content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (3, 8), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 1: 初期配置は自空母(3,8)、敵空母は(26,26)付近。距離約23ヘクス。まず敵空母の正確な位置を索敵する必要がある。航空部隊の作戦行動距離は22ヘクスなので、現在位置から直接(26,26)を索敵可能。2機を異なる方向に発艦させ、敵空母の位置を特定する。ASQ1を(26,26)方向、ASQ2を(25,27)方向に発艦させ、広域索敵を実施。空母は敵の索敵を避けるため、やや北西方向(5,6)へ移動開始。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 5, "y": 6}, "launch_target": {"x": 26, "y": 26}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=26 y=26 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=18 y=21.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "Turn 1修正: 航空部隊の作戦行動距離22ヘクスの制約を見落としていた。自空母(3,8)から距離22以内に目標を設定する必要がある。敵空母推定位置(26,26)は距離約28ヘクスで直接到達不可。まず空母を敵方向へ前進させつつ、現在到達可能な範囲で索敵を実施。ASQ1を(18,21)方向、ASQ2を(20,23)方向に発艦させ、敵空母が存在しそうな海域の索敵を開始。空母は東南方向(8,12)へ前進し、次ターン以降でより遠方を索敵可能にする。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 8, "y": 12}, "launch_target": {"x": 18, "y": 21}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward position (18, 21) while at (3, 11).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (3, 10), en route to target (8, 12), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (3, 11), outbound toward (18, 21), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 2: ASQ1は(3,11)から(18,21)へ向けて索敵中。空母は(3,10)から(8,12)へ移動中。ASQ2をまだ発艦させていないので、別方向へ索敵させる。敵空母は(26,26)付近と推定されるが、現在の空母位置(3,10)からは距離22以内で(20,24)程度まで到達可能。ASQ2を(20,24)方向に発艦させ、ASQ1とは異なる索敵ラインを確保。これにより敵空母発見の確率を高める。空母は引き続き(8,12)へ前進し、次ターン以降でより広範囲の索敵を可能にする。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 20, "y": 24}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=20 y=24 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=18 y=23.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "Turn 2修正: 空母位置(3,10)から距離22以内を正確に計算する必要がある。(20,24)は距離約24ヘクスで範囲外。推奨座標(18,23)は範囲内。ASQ1は(18,21)方向、ASQ2は(18,23)方向に発艦させ、やや異なる索敵ラインで敵空母捜索を実施。空母は(8,12)へ継続前進し、次ターン以降でより遠方(26,26)付近を索敵可能な位置を目指す。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 18, "y": 23}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward position (18, 23) while at (4, 13).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (4, 12), en route to target (8, 12), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (6, 13), outbound toward (18, 21), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (4, 13), outbound toward (18, 23), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 3: 両航空部隊が索敵中。ASQ1は(6,13)から(18,21)へ、ASQ2は(4,13)から(18,23)へ向かっている。空母は(4,12)で(8,12)へ移動中。両機とも目標到達まで約3ターン必要。敵空母(26,26)付近はまだ索敵範囲外。空母を(8,12)到達後、さらに東南方向(12,16)へ前進させる計画。これにより次回発艦時に(26,26)付近を索敵可能になる。現在は両機の索敵結果を待つ。空母は継続前進。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 12, "y": 16}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (5, 13), en route to target (12, 16), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (9, 15), outbound toward (18, 21), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (7, 15), outbound toward (18, 23), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 4: 両航空部隊が順調に索敵中。ASQ1は(9,15)から(18,21)へ、ASQ2は(7,15)から(18,23)へ進行中。空母は(5,13)から(12,16)へ移動中。両機とも目標到達まで約2-3ターン。まだ敵空母は発見されていない。空母は(12,16)到達後、さらに東方向(16,18)へ前進し、敵空母推定位置(26,26)により近づく。これにより両機帰還後、次の索敵で(26,26)付近を直接索敵可能になる。現状は索敵継続、空母前進継続。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 16, "y": 18}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (7, 13), en route to target (16, 18), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (12, 17), outbound toward (18, 21), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (10, 18), outbound toward (18, 23), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 5: ASQ1は(12,17)から(18,21)へ、ASQ2は(10,18)から(18,23)へ進行中。両機とも目標到達まで約1-2ターン。空母は(7,13)から(16,18)へ移動中。まだ敵空母未発見。ASQ1は次ターンに(18,21)到達予定。敵空母(26,26)は(18,21)から距離約10ヘクスで索敵範囲(vision5)外。両機が目標到達しても敵発見できない可能性高い。空母を(16,18)まで前進させ、両機帰還後に(26,26)付近を直接索敵できる位置を確保する。現状維持で索敵継続。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (15, 14) while at (15, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (15, 14) (previously at (16, 15)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (9, 13), en route to target (16, 18), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (15, 19), outbound toward (18, 21), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (13, 20), outbound toward (18, 23), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 6: 重要な発見！ASQ1が(15,19)で敵航空部隊BSQ1を(15,14)で発見。BSQ1は(16,15)から(15,14)へ移動中、つまり西方向へ移動している。これは敵航空部隊が索敵または攻撃任務中であることを示す。敵空母の位置を逆算：BSQ1の移動方向から、敵空母は東方向、おそらく(26,26)付近ではなくもっと近い位置にいる可能性。BSQ1が西へ移動しているということは、敵空母から発艦して西方向を索敵中と推測。敵空母は(20,20)～(26,26)の範囲にいる可能性が高い。自空母(9,13)は敵に発見されるリスクあり。緊急回避として北西方向(6,10)へ変更。ASQ1とASQ2は目標継続で索敵を完了させる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 6, "y": 10}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=6 y=10 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=5 y=12.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "Turn 6修正: 敵航空部隊BSQ1を(15,14)で発見。BSQ1は(16,15)→(15,14)と西方向へ移動中。これは敵が索敵中であることを示す。敵空母位置を推定：BSQ1の移動方向から、敵空母は東方向(20,20)～(26,26)の範囲にいる可能性。自空母(9,13)は敵索敵範囲に入るリスクあり。(6,10)は陸地なので、推奨座標(5,12)へ回避。北西方向へ移動し敵索敵から逃れる。ASQ1とASQ2は索敵継続で敵空母位置を特定する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 5, "y": 12}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (11, 13) while at (7, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (22, 18) while at (18, 21).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (22, 18) (previously at (22, 18)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (11, 13) (previously at (16, 15)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (7, 13), en route to target (5, 12), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (18, 21), outbound toward (22, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (16, 21), outbound toward (18, 23), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 7: 重大な展開！ASQ1が敵空母BC1を(22,18)で発見！予想より近い位置。ASQ1は自動的に攻撃目標を(22,18)に変更。敵空母は(26,26)ではなく(22,18)にいた。自空母(7,13)は敵航空部隊BSQ1を(11,13)で発見。BSQ1は自空母に接近中で非常に危険。距離4ヘクスで次ターン攻撃される可能性大。緊急回避必須。ASQ2は(16,21)から(18,23)へ向かっているが、敵空母(22,18)が判明したので攻撃目標に変更すべき。しかしASQ2は既に発艦中で目標変更不可。空母は北西方向(3,10)へ緊急回避。BSQ1から逃れる。ASQ1の攻撃成功を期待。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 3, "y": 10}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (7, 13) while at (5, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (21, 20) while at (21, 19).
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (21, 20) while at (19, 21).
- your squadron(ASQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (21, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (21, 20) (previously at (22, 18)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (7, 13) (previously at (16, 15)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (5, 13), en route to target (3, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (21, 19), engaging an enemy target at (21, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (19, 21), outbound toward (21, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 8: 絶好の展開！ASQ1が敵空母BC1を(21,20)で攻撃中。ASQ2も(21,20)へ向かっている。敵空母は(22,18)→(21,20)と移動中。両航空部隊で波状攻撃可能。自空母(5,13)は敵航空部隊BSQ1と同位置(7,13)で発見されたが、自空母は(5,13)に移動済み。BSQ1は自空母を追跡中の可能性。距離2ヘクスで次ターン攻撃される危険性大。空母は(3,10)へ継続回避。ASQ1の攻撃でBC1にダメージを与え、ASQ2が追撃する。BSQ1からの攻撃を回避しつつ、敵空母撃沈を目指す。現状維持で攻撃継続。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (21, 19).
- your squadron(ASQ1) hit an enemy carrier(BC1) causing 18 damage while at (21, 19).
- your squadron(ASQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (21, 19).
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (4, 13) while at (4, 12).
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (21, 20) while at (20, 19).
- your squadron(ASQ2) is engaging an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (20, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (21, 20) (previously at (22, 18)), HP 79/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (4, 13) (previously at (16, 15)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (4, 12), en route to target (3, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (21, 19), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (20, 19), engaging an enemy target at (21, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 9: ASQ1が敵空母BC1に18ダメージを与え、BC1は82/100→79/100 (記載ミス？)。ASQ1は帰還中、HP22/40と対空砲火でダメージ受けた。ASQ2が(20,19)で敵空母BC1(21,20)を攻撃中。次ターンでさらにダメージを与える。自空母(4,12)は敵航空部隊BSQ1を(4,13)で発見。距離1ヘクスで極めて危険！BSQ1は次ターン自空母を攻撃する可能性大。緊急回避必須。(3,10)は陸地に近く危険。西方向(1,12)または南西(2,14)へ回避。(1,12)へ変更し、BSQ1から逃れる。ASQ2の攻撃成功を期待。ASQ1は帰還中で指示不要。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 1, "y": 12}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (20, 19).
- your squadron(ASQ2) hit an enemy carrier(BC1) causing 13 damage while at (20, 19).
- your squadron(ASQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (20, 19).
- your carrier(AC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(BSQ1) while at (4, 12).
- your carrier(AC1) hit an enemy squadron(BSQ1) causing 24 damage while at (4, 12).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(BC1) at (21, 20) while at (18, 18).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (17, 15) while at (18, 18).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (17, 15) while at (20, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (21, 20) (previously at (22, 18)), HP 52/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (4, 13) (previously at (16, 15)), HP 17/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (17, 15) (previously at (17, 14)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (4, 12), en route to target (1, 12), HP 76/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (18, 18), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (20, 19), returning to the carrier, HP 27/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 10: 重要な状況変化。ASQ2が敵空母BC1に13ダメージ、BC1は52/100に。両航空部隊が帰還中。自空母AC1がBSQ1に対空攻撃で24ダメージ、BSQ1は17/40に。しかし自空母もBSQ1の攻撃を受けHP76/100に。新たに敵航空部隊BSQ2を(17,15)で発見。BSQ2は(17,14)→(17,15)と北上中、自空母方向へ接近している可能性。自空母(4,12)は西方向(1,12)へ回避中だが、BSQ1(17/40)とBSQ2(40/40)両方から追撃される危険。さらに西(0,10)または南西(2,16)へ回避を検討。ASQ1(22/40)とASQ2(27/40)は帰還中で再攻撃には時間がかかる。敵空母BC1(52/100)は半減したが、敵航空部隊2機が健在。自空母を(2,16)へ変更し、敵航空部隊から距離を取る。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 2, "y": 16}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=2 y=16 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=1 y=14.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "Turn 10修正: 自空母AC1はHP76/100、BSQ1の攻撃を受けた。BSQ1は17/40と弱体化。新たにBSQ2(40/40)を発見、(17,15)で北上中。自空母は敵航空部隊2機から逃れる必要。(2,16)は陸地なので推奨座標(1,14)へ変更。南西方向へ回避し、敵航空部隊との距離を確保。ASQ1(22/40)とASQ2(27/40)は帰還中。敵空母BC1は52/100と半減。両航空部隊が帰還・再発艦できれば敵空母撃沈可能。まずは自空母の生存を優先。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 1, "y": 14}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.

Recent events:

- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (7, 13) (previously at (16, 15)), HP 17/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (19, 19) (previously at (17, 14)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron ASQ1: position (14, 18), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (16, 19), returning to the carrier, HP 27/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "Turn 11: 敵空母BC1は(21,21)へ移動、HP52/100。BSQ1は(7,13)で自空母から距離5ヘクス、HP17/40と弱体化。BSQ2は(19,19)で自空母から遠い。自空母(2,13)は(1,14)へ移動中。ASQ1は(14,18)、ASQ2は(16,19)で帰還中。両機とも数ターンで帰還予定。BSQ1(17/40)は自空母を追跡中だが弱体化しており、対空砲火で撃墜可能。自空母は(1,14)到達後、南方向(1,18)へ移動し、BSQ1から距離を取りつつ両航空部隊の帰還を待つ。帰還後、両機を再発艦させて敵空母BC1(52/100)を撃沈する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 1, "y": 18}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=1 y=18 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=0 y=20.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "Turn 11修正: 自空母(2,13)は(1,14)へ移動中。BSQ1(17/40)が(7,13)で追跡中だが弱体化。BSQ2(40/40)は(19,19)で遠方。敵空母BC1(52/100)は(21,21)。ASQ1(22/40)とASQ2(27/40)は帰還中。(1,18)は陸地なので推奨座標(0,20)へ変更。南方向へ移動し、BSQ1から距離を取りつつ両航空部隊の帰還を待つ。帰還後、両機を再発艦させて敵空母BC1を撃沈する作戦。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 0, "y": 20}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 12 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (20, 20) while at (15, 19).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (11, 15) while at (10, 18).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (11, 15) while at (12, 19).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (21, 21) (previously at (22, 18)), HP 52/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (11, 15) (previously at (16, 15)), HP 17/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (20, 20) (previously at (17, 14)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (4, 14), en route to target (0, 20), HP 76/100, speed 2, vision 4.
